Registry Views¶

class registry.views.MetricModuleData(**kwargs)¶

Upload or download a metric module data.

registry.views.add_dynamic_filter(*args, **kwargs)¶

Add a filter with its default parameters in the registry (redis). List all the dynamic filters registered.

registry.views.add_metric(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get all registered workload metrics (GET) or add a new metric workload in the registry (POST).

Parameters:request (HttpRequest) – The http request.
Returns:A JSON list with all registered metrics (GET) or a success/error message depending on the result of the function.
Return type:JSONResponse
registry.views.add_tenants_group(*args, **kwargs)¶

Add a tenant group or list all the tenants groups saved in the registry.

registry.views.dynamic_filter_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get, update or delete a dynamic filter from the registry.

registry.views.dynamic_policy_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve, update or delete SLA.

registry.views.gtenants_tenant_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Delete a member from a tenants group.

registry.views.list_storage_node(*args, **kwargs)¶

Add a storage node or list all the storage nodes saved in the registry. :param request: :return: JSONResponse

registry.views.metric_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get, update or delete a metric workload from the registry.

registry.views.metric_module_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve, update or delete a metric module.

registry.views.metric_module_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all metric modules

registry.views.node_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

GET: Retrieve node details. PUT: Update node. :param request: :param node_id: :return:

registry.views.node_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

GET: List all nodes ordered by name

registry.views.object_type_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

GET: List extensions allowed about an object type word registered. PUT: Update the object type word registered. DELETE: Delete the object type word registered.

registry.views.object_type_items_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Delete an extension from an object type definition.

registry.views.object_type_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

GET: List all object types. POST: Bind a new object type.

registry.views.policy_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all policies (sorted by execution_order). Deploy new policies.

registry.views.static_policy_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve, update or delete SLA.

registry.views.storage_node_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get, update or delete a storage node from the registry.

registry.views.tenants_group_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get, update or delete a tenants group from the registry.
